section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This Notice may be cited as the Import and Export Manifests Notice.

section.name: s1A
section.heading: Application of this Notice to Ozone Layer Protection Ordinance
section.leadIn: In this Notice, a reference to— (E.R. 7 of 2020)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: “import licence” is a reference to an import licence or an import and export licence issued under the Ozone Layer Protection Ordinance (Cap. 403); and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: “export licence” is a reference to an export licence or an import and export licence issued under the Ozone Layer Protection Ordinance (Cap. 403).

subsection.content: An import manifest relating to the import of any cargo into Hong Kong shall, from 1 January 1984, contain the particulars of the cargo as set out in subparagraphs (2) and (3).

subsection.leadIn: In the case of cargo in packages, the particulars referred to in subparagraph (1) are—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: carried by vessel, the number, description, gross weight and gross volume of the packages;

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: carried otherwise than by vessel, the number, description and either the gross weight or the gross volume of the packages;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the distinguishing marks or numbers appearing on each package;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: a description of the articles contained in each package;

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: the name and address of the consignor of each package;

paragraph.name: e
paragraph.content: the name and address of the consignee of each package;

paragraph.name: f
paragraph.content: the place at which each package was loaded in or on to the vessel, aircraft or vehicle;

paragraph.name: g
paragraph.content: the reference number and letters of the bill of lading, air waybill or air consignment note issued in respect of the consignment of each package;

paragraph.name: h
paragraph.content: a clear indication whether or not the cargo is transhipment cargo;

paragraph.name: i
paragraph.content: the import licence number, where applicable;

paragraph.name: j
paragraph.content: the name, date of arrival and the voyage, flight or vehicle number of the carrying vessel, aircraft or vehicle;

paragraph.name: k
paragraph.content: the container numbers, if the cargo is containerized, and a clear indication whether or not such containers are refrigerated containers.

subsection.leadIn: In the case of cargo in bulk, the particulars referred to in subparagraph (1) are—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: carried by vessel, the description, gross weight and gross volume of the cargo;

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: carried otherwise than by vessel, the description and either the gross weight or the gross volume of the cargo;

paragraph.name: h
paragraph.content: a clear indication whether or not the cargo is transhipment cargo;

paragraph.name: i
paragraph.content: the import licence number, where applicable;

paragraph.name: j
paragraph.content: the name, date of arrival and the voyage, flight or vehicle number of the carrying vessel, aircraft or vehicle;

paragraph.name: k
paragraph.content: the container numbers, if the cargo is containerized, and a clear indication whether or not such containers are refrigerated containers.

subsection.content: An export manifest relating to the export of any cargo from Hong Kong shall, from 1 January 1984, contain the particulars of the cargo as set out in subparagraphs (2) and (3).
